contents.name: endcapName
contents.description: Name of endcap. E.g. Endcap of Aisle 6

contents.name: areaCoordinates
contents.description: X-Y-Z coodinate of the area location

contents.name: isPartOf
contents.description: Defines the relationship where this store is located in an aisle.

contents.name: locatedIn
contents.description: Defines the relationship where this endcap is located in a display area.
